definition: being the sex (of plant or animal) that produces gametes (spermatozoa) that perform the fertilizing function in generation, an animal that produces gametes (spermatozoa) that can fertilize female gametes (ova)
details:
adjective
- being the sex (of plant or animal) that produces gametes (spermatozoa) that perform the fertilizing function in generation
= example: being the sex (of plant or animal) that produces gametes (spermatozoa) that perform the fertilizing function in generation
- for or pertaining to or composed of men or boys
= example: for or pertaining to or composed of men or boys
- characteristic of a man
= example: characteristic of a man
= synonyms: manly
noun
- an animal that produces gametes (spermatozoa) that can fertilize female gametes (ova)
- a person who belongs to the sex that cannot have babies
= synonyms: male person
